about_the_game:
Cowboys, gunslingers and law-people alike will find a home in the Wild West tileset! Build fancy hotels, saloons, farms and ranches, sheriff’s offices and tons more.

The Wild West tileset includes:

Ground tiles

Water tiles (with one deep pool you can use for horse troughs, etc)
Grass, dirt, rock, sand, and stone floors
Red diamond rug
Tables and fences
Tall grass
Rocks and cracks
Wood floors in various tones

Wall tiles:

Two styles of wood panel walls in new and aged wood tones, log walls, plain walls, vault wall, dirt and stone walls, wallpaper patterns and more!

Also includes:

Stairs to match flooring
Trees, cacti, rocks and cliff tiles
Bridges, ladders, planks, climbable rope, etc
Rickety fence
Gravestones and wood crosses
Signs in multiple designs
Farm/ranch tiles, with plain everyday furniture and accessories
Fancy furniture, art, piano, etc
School desks
Small church setup with pews, pulpit, etc
Small casino with 3 table styles, chips, dice, card, etc
Saloon with several types of liquor bottles, broken bottles, taps, and counter setup
Barber shop
Jail cell, wanted posters, badge, guns and other law enforcement details
Bank with teller windows, vault setup, stacks of cash and gold coins, and more
Vintage advertising signs
Small shop setup with meats, vegetables, and dairy products
Small water tower
Doctor’s office supplies – bottles, white coat, scalpels, etc
Post office with cubicles for letters, mail bags, etc
and more!


Events and Animations

Fire animations
Small safe
Box, crate and barrel with opening animations (can be used for treasure boxes)
Rustic doors and fancy doors, with white, black and transparent backdrops
Jail cell doors
Gates
Swinging saloon doors
Large vault door


UPDATE January 2025:

* Bugfixes, exchanged bottles and jars for nicer ones


Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
